SELECT saaae.account_status, COUNT(saaae.annual_adjust_account_emp_id) cnt FROM ss_annual_adjust_account_emp saaae INNER JOIN ss_annual_adjust_account saaa ON saaae.annual_adjust_account_id=saaa.annual_adjust_account_id AND saaa.is_active=1 AND saaa.adjust_year=YEAR(NOW())
saaae.is_active=1 AND saaa.annual_adjust_account_id = #{annualAdjustAccountId} GROUP BY saaae.account_status

SELECT CASE WHEN t.employee_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END match_status, COUNT(CASE WHEN t.employee_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) cnt FROM ss_annual_adjust_account_emp saaae INNER JOIN ss_annual_adjust_account saaa ON saaae.annual_adjust_account_id = saaa.annual_adjust_account_id AND saaa.is_active = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sacr.com_account_id, saac.company_id, saac.company_name, saace.ss_serial, saace.employee_id, saace.employee_name, saace.salary FROM ss_annual_adjust_company_emp saace INNER JOIN ss_annual_adjust_company saac ON saac.annual_adjust_company_id = saace.annual_adjust_company_id AND saac.is_active = 1 AND saace.is_active = 1 AND saac.adjust_year = YEAR(NOW()) INNER JOIN ss_account_com_relation sacr ON saac.company_id = sacr.company_id AND sacr.is_active = 1 ) t ON t.com_account_id = saaa.com_account_id AND saaae.ss_serial = t.ss_serial AND saaae.employee_name = t.employee_name WHERE saaae.is_active = 1 AND saaa.adjust_year = YEAR(NOW()) AND saaa.annual_adjust_account_id = #{annualAdjustAccountId} GROUP BY CASE WHEN t.employee_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END;

SELECT COUNT(saace.annual_adjust_company_emp_id) cnt FROM ss_annual_adjust_company_emp saace INNER JOIN ss_annual_adjust_company saac ON saace.annual_adjust_company_id=saac.annual_adjust_company_id AND saac.is_active=1 AND saac.adjust_year=YEAR(NOW()) INNER JOIN ss_account_com_relation sacr ON saac.company_id=sacr.company_id AND sacr.is_active=1
saace.is_active=1 AND sacr.com_account_id=#{comAccountId}

SELECT DISTINCT saac.account_avg_month_salary, saac.account_salary_amount, saac.account_emp_count FROM ss_annual_adjust_company saac INNER JOIN ss_account_com_relation sacr ON saac.company_id = sacr.company_id AND sacr.is_active = 1 AND saac.adjust_year = YEAR(NOW()) INNER JOIN ss_annual_adjust_account saaa ON saaa.com_account_id = sacr.com_account_id
saaa.is_active = 1 AND saaa.adjust_year = YEAR(NOW()) AND saaa.annual_adjust_account_id = #{annualAdjustAccountId}
